Beinn Dearg (Blair Atholl)

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Beinn Dearg is a dome of pink granite rising above the surrounding moorlands in the remote area north of Blair Atholl.

 You have not climbed Beinn Dearg (Blair Atholl).

Region: Perthshire

Altitude: 1008 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 2.91/5
Rating: 2.9/5 (80 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Beinn Dearg from the Old Bridge of Tilt, Blair Atholl

Other routes and challenges

All alternative routes are longer. One obvious one is up Glen Bruar from Calvine.

Walkers heading for the extremely remote Corbett, Beinn Bhreac, often approaching it over the summit of of Beinn Dearg.

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Perthshire Hotels

Perthshire B&B

Perthshire Cottages

Perthshire Hostels
